sentences.en: a composition by jazzman Dave Brubeck, called ‘Chromatic Fantasy’
sentences.cn: 爵士音乐家戴夫•布鲁贝克的作品《半音阶幻想曲》

sentences.en: Apart from some spelling mistakes, the composition is fairly good.
sentences.cn: 除了一些拼写错误, 这篇文章写得很不错.

sentences.en: Have you finished your composition already? You are very speedy.
sentences.cn: 你已经写完作文了 吧 ?你动作真快.

sentences.en: He merits a grade of B on his composition.
sentences.cn: 他的作文分数应该得B.

sentences.en: He played a piece of music of his own composition.
sentences.cn: 他演奏了一首自己创作的曲子.

sentences.en: Her drawing is competent, but her composition is poor.
sentences.cn: 她的画有功力, 但布局欠佳.

sentences.en: His composition is excellent except for some grammatical mistakes.
sentences.cn: 他的作文写得很好,只有几处语法错误.

sentences.en: I had to write a composition about the Royal visit.
sentences.cn: 我得写一篇关于皇室出访的作文。

sentences.en: Make an outline before trying to write a composition.
sentences.cn: 写作文之前先写个提纲.

sentences.en: Mozart's compositions are undoubtedly among the world's greatest.
sentences.cn: 莫扎特的作品无疑位列于世界上最伟大的作品之中。

sentences.en: Some minerals have complex chemical compositions.
sentences.cn: 有些矿物的化学构成很复杂。

sentences.en: the chemical composition of the soil
sentences.cn: 土壤的化学成分

sentences.en: The composition is all right, but there is room for improvement.
sentences.cn: 这篇作文还不错, 不过还可以改进.

sentences.en: The course is designed to help students with colour and composition.
sentences.cn: 设置这门课程是为了指导学生如何运用色彩和构图。

sentences.en: The Journals contain accounts of literary composition.
sentences.cn: 《期刊》中有关于文学创作的报道。

sentences.en: The majority always turn an unfavorable attitude towards atonal composition.
sentences.cn: 大多数人对无调性作品的态度往往是不能接受的.

sentences.en: The prelude to the musical composition is very long.
sentences.cn: 这首乐曲的序曲很长.

sentences.en: The teacher singled out one composition for class discussion.
sentences.cn: 教师挑选出一篇作文来供课堂上讨论.

sentences.en: They decided to make a composition with their rivals.
sentences.cn: 他们决定和他们的对手妥协.

sentences.en: This point will be taken in composition with other points.
sentences.cn: 这一点将与其余各点一并考虑.

sentences.en: We had to write a composition on the subject "My Pet."
sentences.cn: 我们得就“我的宠物”这个主题写一篇作文。

words.tran_cn: 作曲家；作家，著作者；设计者
组成；作曲（compose的过去分词）；著作
构成；写作；使平静；排…的版

phrases.tran_cn: 年龄结构；年龄组成；年龄分布
色彩构成；铯彩构图；彩色合成
植物区系组成；植物种类成分
颗粒级配；颗粒组成；粒度组成
相组成；相成分；相位成分

trans.tran_cn: 组成，作品，作文，艺术创作技巧，作曲，构图
trans.tran_en: the way in which something is made up of different parts, things, or members
